long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meeting Cost Calculator for Google Calendar

Transform your Google Calendar experience with the Meeting Cost Calculator extension. Easily calculate the cost of your meetings based on a customizable hourly rate. Whether you're managing team meetings, client sessions, or any other scheduled events, this extension helps you stay mindful of the financial impact and manage your time more efficiently.


🌟 KEY FEATURES 🌟

→ Automatic Cost Calculation: As you create or update events in Google Calendar, the extension automatically calculates the estimated cost based on the duration and number of participants.
→ Customizable Hourly Rate: Set and adjust the hourly rate to reflect the actual cost of participants' time. The rate can be easily updated to match different scenarios or team rates.
→ Intuitive Interface: A simple and intuitive interface integrated directly into your Google Calendar, providing real-time cost estimates without any additional steps.
→ Privacy & Security: All calculations are done locally in your browser, ensuring that your data remains private and secure.


🚀 GET STARTED IN THREE EASY STEPS 🚀

Install the Extension: Add the Meeting Cost Calculator to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
Set Your Hourly Rate: Open the extension popup and input the hourly rate that corresponds to your team's or company's billing rate.
View Costs: Navigate to your Google Calendar, where the extension will automatically display the estimated cost for each meeting based on the hourly rate and meeting details.


🌐 IDEAL FOR 🌐

Project Managers
Team Leads
Freelancers
Business Owners
Anyone who wants to keep track of meeting costs and optimize time management.


Ensure your team's time is spent wisely and cost-effectively with the Meeting Cost Calculator. Install now and start optimizing your meeting expenses!
